fullText:
Hawkeye Warrior

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, Wis 17, elf, any martial class
Benefit: When you use the elven accuracy racial power, you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against the target of the attack until the end of the encounter.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 147.
